dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: Plot Place
dataModel.author: J. Harris
dataModel.description: This table is an intersection which resolves a plot to one or many named places..

entity.entitySummary: This table is the intersection between the plot table and the namedPlace table and will be used for querying either plots located in a named place (including State Park, National Forests etc..) or a the named places in which a plot or group of plots are located.

attribute.attDefinition: Primary Key for the plotPlace table.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plot table.
attribute.attDefinition: This is the foreign key into the plot table.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the namedPlace table
attribute.attDefinition: This is the foreign key into the namedPlace table.
